title: I took a few days off working on the blog site
description: I took a couple days off to fully formulate what I want to do with this blog site.
1. All my main profiles will be added to the pages tab. So that will be my portfolio items, this current profile, and all the profiles that actually post on the webpage.
2. Friends will literally just be a bunch of randome people's images arranged to appear as if they are your friends on a social media site

3. Settings will be a bunch of settings that you can change but will effectively do absolutely nothing because users will not have access to change things on the site. BUT it will look like you are able to change things

4. Profile... This one will probably take some time to create. But it will simply be a social media profile page. This ties into the friends page and all the posts as each profile page will essentially have the styling. The only difference is the text that will be displayed and the picture.
